page.title: 01THE LIFESTYLE OF LONGNEWTON
page.content: OUR{VILLAGE}IS SPLIT INTO TWO.THE OLD AND THE{NEW}ESTATE.THE{OLD}PART IS MOSTLY FARMERS AND THE NEW PART A MIXTURE OF PEOPLE FROM MANY PARTS OF THE COUNTRY . OUR VILLAGE HAS{SPORTY PEOPLE. THREE ENTERED THE LONDON MARATHON AND LOTS MORE HAVE ENTERED OTHER RACES. WE HAVE FAIRS AND SHOWS. {THE VILLAGE SHOW}IS THE BEST SHOW THAT WE HAVE.WE HAVE{FANCY DRESS}AND FLOATS.IN THE{FLOAT}SECTION A GROUP OF PEOPLE FROM MOST OF THE STREETS GET TOGETHER TO DESIGN AN ENTRY.WE HAVE SEEN{ROCKETS,MINES}AND{TANKS}AS FLOAT ENTRIES.THE FLOATS GROUP TOGETHER AT THE TOP OF THE VILLAGE AND PARADE UNTIL THEY GET TO THE PLAYINGS FIELD WHERE THEY ARE JUDGED.
